file.name: ref_noobject.yaml
file.content:
info:
    version: 1.0.0
    title: Bad reference type handling
servers:
    - url: http://localhost:3001/api/v4
tags:
    - name: watching
        #description: Operations about watching people
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
    "/watch/{personId}":
        post:
            operationId: toggleWatch
            summary: "Toggle person watch"
            ##description: ""
            tags:
                - watching
            parameters:
                - name: personId
                  schema:
                      $ref: "#/components/schemas/Mid"
                  in: path
                  required: true
            responses:
                "200":
                    description: Successful operation
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/PersonWatch"
            requestBody:
                required: true
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/PersonWatch"
components:
    schemas:
        Mid:
            description: The MongoDB Identifier
            type: string
            x-faker: false
            x-db-type: false
            pattern: ^[0-9a-f]{24}$
        PersonWatch:
            description: Information about a user watching a Person
            type: object
            x-table: false
            properties:
                personId:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/Mid"
                userId:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/Mid"
                someProp:
                    type: integer
                    x-faker: false
